gw.cc.claim.entity

Interface Negotiation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ClaimContactRoleOwner, com.guidewire.cc.domain.contact.EntityContactRoleOwner

    public interface Negotiation
extends com.guidewire.cc.domain.claim.ClaimContactRoleOwner
    Negotiation A negotiation for a claim or a part of a claim.
